net.gaborszita.realisticelevator.commands.commandmanager

Interface CommandRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddDoorLever, AddFloor, AddFloorDoorLever, CreateElevator, DeleteElevator, ElevatorInfo, GetFloorCallButton, GoToFloor, ListDoorLevers, ListElevators, ListFloorDoorLevers, ListFloors, RemoveDoorLever, RemoveFloor, RemoveFloorCallButton, RemoveFloorDoorLever, SetElevatorLocation, SetFloorCallButton

    public interface CommandRunner
    This interface is the base for a command runner, which is responsible for handling its designated command.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String playerNeedsToRunCommandMessage
      Message to send if the player needs to run a command.
